entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
